articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: Big Tech is now slightly less silent on Trump’s tariffs - The Verge
articles.description: President Donald Trump’s tariffs on goods imported from Mexico, Canada, and China are in effect, but tech companies like Apple, Google, Microsoft, and Meta haven’t publicly said how they will respond to them.
articles.content:
For the most part, some of the biggest tech companies in the world havent said anything about the tariffs that could have a massive effect on their businesses.
For the most part, some of the biggest… [+3564 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: AMD Radeon RX 9070 and 9070 XT review: RDNA 4 fixes a lot of AMD’s problems - Ars Technica
articles.description: For $549 and $599, AMD comes close to knocking out Nvidia’s GeForce RTX 5070.
